This place is amazing.  Easily the best meal we had while in Barcelona--and no meat or seafood!  We had a big, multi-course leisurely lunch here.  The servers were wonderfully helpful and paced things beautifully so that we could imagine a mediterranean lifestyle where long leisurely lunches were the rule and ingredients were always fresh and healthy.  Lastly--the presentation was impeccable.  Even the one course that did not thrill my taste buds impressed my eyes.
